Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "It's over."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1001_3.jpg'}

{3: 'As the arrow hits its mark, a crack spreads on its body like a spiderweb at lightning speed until the Rail Heterozygote disintegrates into nothing but sand, seeping through the gaps onto the railway.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Wonderful... wonderful.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "That's... wonderful."}
{2: "It's all thanks to everyone.", 3: '9', 4: "It's all thanks to Bianca.", 5: '11'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I never thought we could really win against that enemy.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Everyone's safe... Thank goodness..."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That arrow, it's not just a one-time thing, is it?"}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I think it is, in truth, I am already quite tired...'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "M-miss Bianca! Are you all right?! Please refrain from moving, I'll carry out a full examination immediately!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory134.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Looks like it's finally over. What a fantastic display... both the battle and Bianca's final strike.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'How about a deal, then? We will provide intel and products that Babylonia will find satisfactory, and in return, you and your team will join us, Gray Raven Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1000', 2: "I don't intend to jump ship.", 3: '22', 4: "It's not up to me.", 5: '23'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Is our price not acceptable? I'd recommend against underestimating what Akdilek can do... Should we talk about it some more?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Trying to shrug off my offer? Fine...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Babylonia actually can afford new residents after its expansion. The President is happy to welcome you all there.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I don't think so. We should stay here, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commoner A', 3: "Right, we'll all stay here."}
{2: 'Commoner B', 3: "That's what we decided, isn't it?"}
{2: 'Aristocrat A', 3: "Where's Ashlar, by the way?"}
{2: 'Aristocrat B', 3: "Whatever. He's been manipulating us since the beginning... I wonder if the Ascendants have promised him something in return?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Everyone on Akdilek will stay on the Eternal Engine and go forward together.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'No matter how long and how much work it will take, I will never, NEVER stop until I fulfill my promise to myself... to take the train to the end of the line, to the "final station."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I... can do that as well!', 3: '37'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I can't help but feel like it will come true now that you have said so...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Commandant. Can I call you Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Haven't you been doing that already?", 3: '40', 4: "If you'd like to.", 5: '40'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Thanks, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "In that case, let's upload our report here, Commandant. The signal's better at this spot.", 4: '1'}
{3: '(Your comms suddenly rings.)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Thanks for your hard work, Gray Raven Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I've received your mission report. I didn't think you'd finish it in such a short time! Guess I made the right call assigning it to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Unfortunately, there's something I have to tell you...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Another mission? Already?', 3: '51'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Haha! Of course not. I'm not that cruel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'm just here to tell you that we're almost done clearing the surface. Other team are on their way to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "So you'll have to stay on the train for now until the they are there to pick you up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'll notify you when that happens.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Take the chance to enjoy your "exotic" journey! (Laughs) This is your break, after all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'It appears that, Commandant, you are also quite a busy person...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Take the chance to enjoy the "exotic locale"! (Laughs) This is your break, after all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'The food and views on the Eternal Engine are also remarkable wonders.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Perhaps you will change your mind about my offer after you have experienced them.', 4: '1'}
